mapper.sql: id, county, weight, volume, status, outlets_id
mapper.insert: insert into tms_outlets_price_range_conf (id, county, weight, volume, status, outlets_id ) values (#{id}, #{county}, #{weight},#{volume}, #{status}, #{outletsId})

insert into tms_outlets_price_range_conf
id,
county,
weight,
volume,
status,
outlets_id,
#{id,jdbcType=BIGINT},
#{county,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
#{weight,jdbcType=DOUBLE},
#{volume,jdbcType=DOUBLE},
#{status,jdbcType=INTEGER},
#{outletsId,jdbcType=BIGINT},
mapper.update:
update tms_outlets_price_range_conf
county = #{county,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
weight = #{weight,jdbcType=DOUBLE},
volume = #{volume,jdbcType=DOUBLE},
status = #{status,jdbcType=INTEGER},
outlets_id = #{outletsId,jdbcType=BIGINT}
where id = #{id,jdbcType=BIGINT}

update tms_outlets_price_range_conf set county = #{county,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, weight = #{weight,jdbcType=DOUBLE}, volume = #{volume,jdbcType=DOUBLE}, status = #{status,jdbcType=INTEGER}, outlets_id = #{outletsId,jdbcType=BIGINT} where id = #{id,jdbcType=BIGINT}
mapper.select:
select oprc.*,oi.name,xi.name as county_val from tms_outlets_price_range_conf oprc left join tms_outlets_info oi on oi.id = oprc.outlets_id left join lc_xzqh_info xi on oprc.county = xi.id where oprc.outlets_id = #{outletsId} and oprc.status != 0
and xi.name like concat("%",#{searchParams.condition,jdbcType=VARCHAR},"%")
order by id desc

select count(1) from tms_outlets_price_range_conf oprc left join tms_outlets_info oi on oi.id = oprc.outlets_id left join lc_xzqh_info xi on oprc.county = xi.id where oprc.outlets_id =#{outletsId} and oprc.status != 0
and xi.name = #{searchParams.condition}
select count(1) from tms_outlets_price_range_conf oprc left join lc_xzqh_info xi on oprc.county = xi.id where outlets_id = #{outletsId} and status != 0

select oprc.id, oprc.county, oprc.weight, oprc.volume, oprc.status, oprc.outlets_id,xi.name as county_val from tms_outlets_price_range_conf oprc left join lc_xzqh_info xi on oprc.county = xi.id where outlets_id = #{outletsId} order by id desc limit #{page.start},#{page.limit}
mapper.update:
delete from tms_outlets_price_range_conf where id in
#{id}
mapper.select: select oprc.*,xi.name as county_val,oi.name,puc.company_name from tms_outlets_price_range_conf oprc left join lc_xzqh_info xi on oprc.county = xi.id left join tms_outlets_info oi on oi.id = oprc.outlets_id left join lc_platform_user_company puc on puc.id = oi.company_id limit #{page.start},#{page.limit}

select count(1) from tms_outlets_price_range_conf oprc left join lc_xzqh_info xi on oprc.county = xi.id left join tms_outlets_info oi on oi.id = oprc.outlets_id left join lc_platform_user_company puc on puc.id = oi.company_id

select
from tms_outlets_price_range_conf where outlets_id = #{outletsId} and county = #{county}
